body_html: It's true that we used to trace backward, but it's no longer the case. Right now we separate the graph into parts we can differentiate symbolically, and other ops that should be taken care of by autograd (and we don't have visibility into their backward graph anymore).
body_text: It's true that we used to trace backward, but it's no longer the case. Right now we separate the graph into parts we can differentiate symbolically, and other ops that should be taken care of by autograd (and we don't have visibility into their backward graph anymore).
body: It's true that we used to trace backward, but it's no longer the case. Right now we separate the graph into parts we can differentiate symbolically, and other ops that should be taken care of by autograd (and we don't have visibility into their backward graph anymore).
